https://dreamy-bhabha-38106f.netlify.com/news/violence-news-2017-11-16/ ======= http://cupehospitals.ca/news/violence-news-2017-11-16/ Thu, 16 Nov 2017 19:59:22 +0530
http://cupehospitals.ca/news/violence-news-2017-11-16/ >>>>>>> 6086591c4932d7921184afb795e98802f5a9e9be CUPE/OCHU’s anti-violence campaign Epidemic of Violence received extensive media coverage. The media reported on the polling and stories of physical attacks, sexual harassment, verbal abuse, and violence in Ontario hospitals. Every day, frontline caregivers are suffering serious injuries that lead to time off work and even post-traumatic stress disorder. Instead of protecting their staff, hospital managers discourage them from reporting incidents and have even fired a nurse for revealing the real epidemic of violence in healthcare.
